metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21797 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package joblib from 0 and before 1.2.0 are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code Execution via the pre_dispatch flag in Parallel() class due to the eval() statement.

notes.Note: ccdm94> pull request 1321 (commit b90f10e) seems to have been considered an incomplete fix by upstream, and for that reason, PR 1327 (commit 54f4d21) was opened as well in an attempt to completely fix the issue.

criterions.comment: joblib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
